name: LightStrike
description: Welcome to the LightStrike VR Arena, where you face challengers that are out to destroy you before you can destroy them. Players stand on floating Game Pad areas floating high above the future world surface.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: IntelÂ® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 1080 or similar Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X compatible Additional Notes: Best experience is with a GeForce 1080
